Trumpism: A political phenomenon that defies all definition
subhead: Techno-libertarian, isolationist fascist, plutocratic populist? The politics of the 47th US president are impossible to pin down. While some compare his approach to certain European regimes, others argue it should be understood strictly within an American context – even if that means inventing a new term.

ChatGPT: OpenAI launches GPT-5, the latest version of its language processing tool
subhead: GPT-5, the new AI model available to all users of the popular chatbot, aims to be faster, more reliable and more accurate than its predecessor.

title: On an Indonesian island, traces of human presence over one million years old have been discovered
subhead: Seven stone tools found on the island of Sulawesi are challenging current knowledge about the colonization of Asia by the genus 'Homo.' This landmass could only have been populated after a sea crossing, whether intentional or accidental. Many mysteries remain.

title: The advantage of tiny lemurs as research subjects
subhead: An international team has dissected four gray mouse lemurs and has created an atlas of their cells. Certain similarities with human cells could prove useful for biomedical research.

title: 'Here, you can dress however you want': Women-only parties make crowds feel freer
subhead: 'Why Do We Party?' (2/6). A concept that has gained popularity since the #MeToo movement, women-only parties have spread throughout France, giving partygoers the chance to finally lower their guard and let loose.

How Lake Chad became neglected by international aid
subhead: 'Lake Chad's Troubled Waters' (3/4). After a surge of solidarity in response to the attacks by Boko Haram, global attention has shifted away from the region. As NGOs have been weakened by the halt in US funding, the humanitarian situation remains dire.

title: Wildfires blaze in southern France: 'It looked like the apocalypse'
subhead: In the Corbières hills, 16,000 hectares went up in flames in just 24 hours, despite 2,500 firefighters and the mobilization of nearly all of France's aerial resources.

title: The calculated return of Kamala Harris after defeat and months of silence
subhead: The former US vice president announced the release of a memoir, '107 Days,' out September 23, revealing the behind-the-scenes from her presidential campaign. Harris, who appeared Thursday on Stephen Colbert's 'The Late Show' on CBS, has remained vague, however, about the future of her political involvement.
byline: By Corine Lesnes (San Francisco (United States) correspondent)
